MemoryInfobox.description: 'In order to feed his family, a desperate Blacksmith was forced to accept a bad deal from a merchant. The Blacksmith grew angry about the deal and plotted revenge.'

General_Description: '''Dirty Deals''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: A [[merchant]] refused to pay a [[blacksmith]] as agreed. In retribution, the blacksmith sought someone to kill the merchant.
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra noticed a job posted on a [[message board]].
*'''Note:''' ''Need help dealing with a dishonest bastard. MERCHANTS AND OTHER SHIT EATERS NEED NOT APPLY.''
Deciding to look into it, Kassandra sought out the blacksmith.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I saw the note you posted. What's the matter?''
*'''Man:''' ''Weasel-faced little son of a jackal merchant.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Having a bad day?''
*'''Man:''' ''Offered me half of what we agreed on. My family is hungry, and I had to take it. My weapons making him a profit... I'd rather they sink to the bottom of the [[Aegean Sea|ocean]].''
<tabber>
|-|You want the man dead.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''So you need a [[mercenary]] to kill him.''
*'''Man:''' ''Exactly. He must be gutted.''
|-|You need the ship destroyed.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''
*'''Man:''' ''
</tabber>
(Accept - I'll handle it.)
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll take care of it.''
*'''Man:''' ''Thank you, mercenary.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You can leave everything to me.''
Kassandra left the blacksmith and sought out the merchant. After dealing with him, Kassandra returned to the blacksmith for her reward.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
